name: Qeynos Hills
description: Rolling hills surrounding the city of Qeynos. Wild creatures roam these lands.

name: Qeynos Catacombs
description: Ancient catacombs beneath Qeynos, filled with undead and forgotten treasures.

name: Blackburrow
description: A network of gnoll-infested tunnels carved into the hillside.

name: Neriak
description: The dark elven city, hidden in shadow and mystery.
